amendment.description: Amendment specifies that assessment metrics required to measure contractor performance include "compliance of such contractors with department policy regarding the use of certain small businesses".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 111-467 to specify that assessment metrics required to measure contractor performance include "compliance of such contractors with department policy regarding the use of certain small businesses.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore (WI) amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Moore (WI) amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Moore (WI).
